definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
cirrostratus (cloud)/also written 捲層雲|卷层云[juan3 ceng2 yun2]
cirrostratus (cloud)/also written 卷層雲|卷层云[juan3 ceng2 yun2]

sentences.english: The second is on the role played by high-level clouds, particularly over the tropical oceans.
sentences.chinese: 二是高層雲尤其是熱帶海洋上空的雲層的角色。

sentences.english: You could see the flat tops of the pine trees, and the evening light was upon the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 你能看到松樹們平平的樹頂，而晚霞映紅了層雲。

sentences.english: The descending warm air of the kata-warm front greatly restricts the development of medium-and high-level clouds.
sentences.chinese: 下滑鋒中的下沉暖空氣極大限制了中高層雲的發展。

sentences.english: Altocumulus clouds, embedded in the altostratus cloud, can be seen at left.
sentences.chinese: 在照片左邊，可以看到一部分的高積雲嵌在高層雲中。

sentences.english: In this time of year you can enjoy the beauty of the polar mesospheric clouds.
sentences.chinese: 在每年的這個時候你可以欣賞到極地中氣層雲美。

sentences.english: Thank you for the update – we may not bring the stratus table then.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝我們可能不然後帶來層雲桌的更新。

sentences.english: The default condition is a combination of cumulus and stratus clouds.
sentences.chinese: 默認狀態的組合是積雲和層雲。

definition: border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
Milky Way/also called 銀河|银河[Yin2 he2]
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
infantile convulsion (illness affecting children esp. under the age of five, marked by muscular spasms)
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
